Uses of Interface
emissary.directory.IRemoteDirectory

Packages that use IRemoteDirectory
Package
Description
emissary.directory
The Emissary Directory controls the advertisement and availability of services (places) in the Emissary system.

  • Uses of IRemoteDirectory in emissary.directory

    Classes in emissary.directory that implement IRemoteDirectory
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DirectoryPlace
    The DirectoryPlace class is used to store information relating to Places/Services in the Emissary Agent-Based architecture.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IRemoteDirectory
    IRemoteDirectory.Lookup.getLocalDirectory(String name)
    Look up the local directory using one of two methods.

    static org.jdom2.Document
    DirectoryXmlContainer.buildProxyDocument(IRemoteDirectory dir, String requester)
